candidates.title: Upgrade sqlparser-rs to v0.24, migrate Interval from Literal to Expr
candidates.body:
Main change is that we now no longer have `AstLiteral::Interval` and that is replaced by `Expr::Interval`.

cc. @ding-young

candidates.title: Set default-run to root workspace Cargo.toml
candidates.body: Fix `cargo run` in the root directory to work.

candidates.title: Support `.edit {fileName|None}` in CLI
candidates.body:
To resolve #870 

## Implement
### 1. Open temporary editor with last SQL
```
$> cargo run
gluesql> .run
[error] Nothing in SQL history to run.
gluesql> SELECT 1, 'a', true
```
| 1 | 'a' | true |
|---|-----|------|
| 1 | a   | TRUE |
```
gluesql> .edit
```
=> open Editor with last command on temporary file like /tmp/Glue_****.sql

```sql
-- modify in editor
SELECT 1, 'a', true, 2, 'b'
```
If you want to fix editor type, run below command on OS
```sh
# (optional)
$> export EDITOR=vi
```
```
gluesql> .run
```
| 1 | 'a' | true | 2 | 'b' |
|---|-----|------|---|-----|
| 1 | a   | TRUE | 2 | b   |
### 2. Open editor with physical file
```
gluesql> .edit foo.sql
```
```sql
-- modify in editor
SELECT 1 AS no, 'In physical file' AS name
```
```
gluesql> .execute foo.sql
```
| no | name             |
|----|------------------|
| 1  | In physical file |

candidates.title: Support Dictionary(Schema) view
candidates.body:
## Goal
Support Dictionary view to get schema information.
```sql
gluesql> SELECT * FROM GLUE_TABLES;
```
| TABLE_NAME |
|------------|
| Bar        |
| Foo        |
```sql
gluesql> SELECT * FROM GLUE_TABLE_COLUMNS;
```
| TABLE_NAME | COLUMN_NAME | COLUMN_ID |
|------------|-------------|-----------|
| Bar        | id          | 1         |
| Bar        | name        | 2         |
| Bar        | type        | 3         |
| Foo        | id          | 1         |
| Foo        | name        | 2         |
## Todo
- [x] add TableFactor::Dictionary
- [x] implement fetch_all_schemas
- [x] implement `GLUE_TABLES`, `GLUE_TABLE_COLUMNS` 
- [x] refactor `show tables` with `fetch_all_schemas`, `show version` with direct implementation
- [x] remove feature - metadata
## References
[oracle data dictionary view](https://docs.oracle.com/cd/E11882_01/server.112/e40540/datadict.htm#CNCPT002)
[mysql data dictionary schema](https://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/8.0/en/data-dictionary-schema.html)
[postgresql system catalogs](https://www.postgresql.org/docs/current/catalogs.html)

candidates.title: Remove deprecated wee_alloc dependency use in gluesql-js/
Update core/ chrono dependency version to 0.4.22, specify patch version
candidates.body:
Currently core compile fails with chrono v0.4.19.
So, update the chrono dep version and specify the patch number.

candidates.title: Replace crate::`comfy-table` with `tabled`
candidates.body:
This is a prerequisite PR for #820 
To support CLI option, we decided to replace crate `comfy-table` with `tabled`

## Goal
- Apply new `tabled` to cli
- Set html as default print style like below
```sql
gluesql> SELECT * FROM (VALUES (1, 'a', true), (2, 'b', false)) AS Sub;
```
(pasted from gluesql directly)
| column1 | column2 | column3 |
|---------|---------|---------|
| 1       | a       | TRUE    |
| 2       | b       | FALSE   |
## Todo
- [x] apply crate::tabled
- [x] set html as default print style
- [x] remove crate::comfy-table 
- [x] generalize build(with_style) 
- [x] features QA
  - every features works fine!
```
"command"        ,"description"                       
".help"          ,"show help"                                                                               
".quit"          ,"quit program"                   
".tables"        ,"show table names"                                                                        
".columns TABLE" ,"show columns from TABLE"          
".version"       ,"show version"                                                                            
".execute FILE"  ,"execute SQL from a file"                                                                 
".spool FILE|off","spool to file or off" 
```

candidates.title: Upgrade sqlparser-rs to v0.22
candidates.body:
Upgrade sqlparser-rs from v0.19 to v0.22
Migrate translate_trim, add new supported test case.
Move Like, ILike from ast::BinaryOperator to ast::Expr.
Now "User" is a reserved keyword, so rename test cases which used "User" to use "Player".

candidates.title: Migrate sqlparser-rs from 0.18 to 0.19,
candidates.body:
Add negated field to ast::Expr::Exists.
Update Interval to accept numeric value - e.g. INTERVAL 3 DAY
(previously, it only accepted string value - e.g. INTERAVAL "3" DAY)
